Package com.eventmaster.backend.serviceswithouttoken

Class UserInEventWithRoleService

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.serviceswithouttoken.UserInEventWithRoleService
@Service public class UserInEventWithRoleService extends Object
A class which receives and processes the requests of multiple controllers concerning the management of events
Author:
Fabian Eilber, Fabian Unger

    • getAttendeesForEvent

      public List<User> getAttendeesForEvent(long eventId)
      Finds all attendees for an event and returns them in a list.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event where the users attend.
      Returns:
      List of users

    • getAttendingStatusForUsers

      public List<Boolean> getAttendingStatusForUsers(long eventId, List<Long> userIds)
      Finds all connections between a given event and a list of users and returns their attending states.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event where the users participate.
      userIds - List of IDs from users which participate at the event.
      Returns:
      List of booleans in the order of the List of userIds.

    • updateAttendingStatusForUsers

      public String updateAttendingStatusForUsers(long eventId, List<Long> userIds, List<Boolean> attending)
      Updates the attending status for given users at an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event where the users attend.
      userIds - List of userIds from whom the attending status gets updated.
      attending - List of booleans which contains the new attending states.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • changeRoleOfPersonInEvent

      public String changeRoleOfPersonInEvent(long eventId, String userMail, boolean changeToAttendee)
      Changes the role of an already registered User to an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event where the user attends.
      userMail - Mail address of the user whom role will be changed.
      changeToAttendee - Bool if he switches from attendee to tutor or from tutor to attendee.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • inviteUserToEvent

      public String inviteUserToEvent(long eventId, String userMail, boolean single)
      Invites a user to an event and sends an email.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      userMail - Mail of the user who will be invited.
      single - Boolean if invitation is just for him or because his group was invited.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • inviteUserToFirstEventFromSeries

      public String inviteUserToFirstEventFromSeries(EventSeries eventSeries, long eventId, String userMail)
      Invites a user to the first event of a series.
      Parameters:
      eventSeries - Series of events from which the event is the first one.
      eventId - ID of the event which is the first of the series.
      userMail - Mail of the user who will be invited.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • removeUserFromEvent

      public String removeUserFromEvent(long eventId, String userMail, String reason)
      Removes a user from an event and sends the user an email why.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      userMail - Mail of the user who will be removed.
      reason - Reason why he will be removed.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • removeUsersOfGroupFromEvent

      public String removeUsersOfGroupFromEvent(long eventId, List<User> users, String reason)
      Removes the users from an event if they were invited or attending by a group.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      users - List of the users who are part of the group.
      reason - Reason why they will be removed.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.

    • changeOrganizerOfEvent

      public String changeOrganizerOfEvent(long eventId, String userMail)
      Change the organizer of the event by removing the old organizer of the event and setting the new user as organizer of the event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event.
      userMail - Mail address of the new organizer.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
